overview: Scott Lyle brings a deep and sophisticated background to Alliance Network Group. Scott’s career spans brand development, corporate finance, financial acquisition analysis and integration, corporate budgeting, negotiating strategic alliances, and business development. His expertise was developed in traditional industry, the Internet, and emerging platforms, including both broadband and wireless. Scott was the founder and operator of Tower46, a nationally distributed apparel brand, as well as, a company that developed bio-filtration systems in South East Asia. His experiences also encompass positions held at KPMG, Interbrand, CNET Networks and Macromedia. Scott also has an MBA from THUNDERBIRD - The American Graduate School of International Management and a professional license as a CPA.
